summary: trivalent vaccine mixture was efficacious against a triple challenge of M. hyopneumoniae, porcine circovirus type 2 (PCV2) and porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome virus (PRRSV) results Pigs that were triple challenged with the trivalent vaccine mixture exhibited a significantly better growth performance when compared to unvaccinated and challenged pigs. pneumoniae, PCV2 and PRRSV did not result in equal protection. the trivalent vaccine mixture did not result in equal protection compared against each monovalent vaccine.
